DYAD: ROMANIA - TURKEY/OTTOMAN EMPIRE
RIVALRY: RIV968
DISPUTE(S): MID257 MID3341 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180516
LS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180911

WWI MIDs: MID257 MID3341

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:
Romanian coastguard ships fired on a Turkish fishing vessel near the Romanian coast of the Black Sea on May 22, 2000.

SOURCES-CM: 
*Reuters*, May 22, 2000.
